wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Kerr was a Tyneside writer, journalist and songwriter of the middle and late 19th century.

response: *Thomas Kerr (Kentucky politician) (born 1950), American politician and state legislator in Kentucky
*Thomas Kerr (writer and songwriter), Tyneside writer, journalist and songwriter of the middle and late 19th century
*Thomas Kerr (Royal Navy officer), officer on HMS Pandora during her tenure with the Royal Navy's Pacific Station
*Thomas Kerr (governor), governor of the Falkland Islands

* Jimmy's brocken oot, to the tune of Row upon the stairs, written by Thomas Kerr, (1871 annual)
